text: X in particular is very detailed-oriented and the work produced by his team is of a high standard .
This resonates through the work the team does , as each individual member takes pride in projects , feeling a sense of ownership in the work .

X is very fair , and while he pushes the team to meet sometimes stressful deadlines , he himself often shoulders the longest hours and does not demand anything of those under him that he would n't demand of himself
X and his team are very collaborative .
They receive requests from so many departments in CDPQ but still tackle these professionally and mostly on time .
X truly cares about the professional development and satisfaction of those under his supervision .
